scripts.move:compile: aptos move compile --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p')
scripts.move:test: aptos move test --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p')
scripts.move:publish: aptos move publish --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses todolist_addr=$(npx aptos config show-profiles | grep 'account' | sed -n 's/.*"account": "\(.*\)".*/\1/p') --profile=default
